DOC.criteria: Males 40 year age old schedule prostate biopsy ( know suspect prostate cancer ) follow plan prostatectomy ( population group A ) Males 40 year age old know ( biopsy‐confirmed ) primary adenocarcinoma prostate undergo active surveillance schedule prostate biopsy ( population group B ) Androgen ablation ( hormone treatment ) within last 3 month Prostate biopsy within 6 week prior PET MRI image Active inflammatory bowel disease within last 6 month Acute prostatitis within last 6 month A non‐urologic bacterial infection require active treatment antibiotic Active malignancy ( except basal cell squamous cell skin cancer ) within last 2 year Previous radiation treatment pelvis Symptomatic distal rectal stenosis Known hypersensitivity glucagon Pheochromocytoma , insulinoma galactosemia Insulin‐dependent diabetes
